com.cleo.lexicom.external

Class HostType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.lexicom.external.HostType

  • public class HostType
extends java.lang.Object
    New HostType class gives the predefined host type name, indicates whether it is a local user host, and provides the ILexiCom constants for the host protocol and mailbox packaging. Refer to ILexiCom.listHostTypes().

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the host type name
        Returns:
        HostType.AS2, AS3, EBMS, FTPS, HTTPS, MQ, OFTP, SMTPS, SSHFTP, FAX, MLLP, WS, RNIF, EBICS, LOCAL_FTP_USERS, LOCAL_HTTP_USERS, LOCAL_SSHFTP_USERS

      • isLocal

        public boolean isLocal()
        Indicates whether the host type is a local user host
        Returns:
        true if the host type is a local user host

      • getHostProtocol

        public int getHostProtocol()
        Returns the protocol for the host
        Returns:
        either ILexiCom.HTTP_CLIENT/_SERVER, FTP_CLIENT/_SERVER, OFTP_CLIENT, SSHFTP_CLIENT/_SERVER, MQ_CLIENT, SMTP_CLIENT, or MLLP_CLIENT

      • getMailboxPackaging

        public int getMailboxPackaging()
        Returns the packaging for the host's mailbox
        Returns:
        either ILexiCom.NONE, AS2, AS3, ebMS, RNIF, OPENPGP, or WS
